body.p: Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky Whereas at the November Term of the Caldwell Circuit Court Thomas Simpson was tried on a charge of disturbing relegious worship and fined in the sum of ten dollars and costs and haveing manely the care of a mother and three sisters and in vary humble circumstances and this being the onley charge that is against him or that we ever herd against him but on the contrary he is of good moral Stating now we your petioners would ask for Executive clemency in his case by the re^m^ission of said fine and by so doing you petitioners would be under renewed obligations January 18th 1861
